definition: multimedia education (abbr. for 電化教育|电化教育)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The use of audio-visual mass media in teaching is an important means of modern teaching.
sentences.chinese: 運用電教媒體展開教學是現代教學的重要手段。

sentences.english: To stimulate perceiver to make active thinking by means of educational technology.
sentences.chinese: 利用電教手段促進學習者積極思維。
